attributes.action: Request all Councils to justify their Council Tax Income and Expenditure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
My petition is simple, for Councils to give a simple and proper account for the costings of the Council Tax and to prove why it costs us more each year, bearing in mind the following important associated information, and request by all council tax payers to request the following information:

1. The annual income figure received for Council Tax year on year since it began.

2. The number of council houses year on year.

3. Most importantly the number of private houses and private schemes built year on year.

When that information is received we should be given a detailed account of the expenditure of the council tax revenue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
